content.description: This challenging and excellent climb ascends a face and blunt arete on the SW side of Harry's Quarry.  The first pitch starts on the left and traverses in to the arete past a bolt or two, then up the blunt arete past 2 more bolts. There is a 2 bolt anchor on the ledge at the top of pitch one. Pitch 2 goes up steep edges and smears past 3 more bolts to the summit.  (Gear needed for anchor on summit) It is a bolted face climb, but a little bit run out to be called a sport route.
content.protection: Quick draws for pitch one and two, and, I believe, gear needed for the summit anchor.
content.location: Located on the SW side of Harry's Quarry.

climbs.name: Martin Luther's Thing
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Tom Burke

content.description: This cool crack climb is very short, but a little too long to be considered a boulder problem.  It starts off the ledge on the top of pitch one of The Milk Arete, and goes to the top from there.
content.protection: A few med to large cams.
content.location: This crack climb is located on the SW side of Harry's Quarry.

content.description:
A somewhat loose crack that curves up the block and ends on a ledge.

Rappel from anchors atop

Milk Arete

or continue up

Martin Luther's Thing

for a more difficult second pitch.
content.location:
Just left of

Milk Arete

is this curving crack that splits the block.

content.description: This climb is located on the buttress to the left of the Milk Arete.  4 bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: Light colored buttress to the left of The Milk Arete in the Harry's Quarry Area of Geotour.

pathTokens: Jerry's Quarry and Lost Pencil Areas
